      abstract RetryingCallerInterceptorContext RetryingCallerInterceptorContext.prepare(RetryingCallable<?> callable)
      This prepares the context object by populating it with information specific to the implementation of the RetryingCallerInterceptor along with which this will be used.

      Telescopic extension that takes which of the many retries we are currently in.

      abstract void RetryingCallerInterceptor.handleFailure(RetryingCallerInterceptorContext context, Throwable t)
